original_text: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.
korean_text: 제자들의 마음을 굳게 하여 이 믿음에 머물러 있으라 권하고 또 우리가 하나님의 나라에 들어가려면 많은 환난을 겪어야 할 것이라 하고

sentences.original_text: Confirming the souls of the disciples
and exhorting them to continue in the faith
and that we must through much tribulation
enter into the kingdom of God
